item.title: Readings
item.description: SesÂ # Topics Readings 1 Introduction and overview of consumer financial markets Tufano, Peter, Andrea Ryan, and Daniel Schneider, “An Introduction to Consumer Credit” Harvard Business School Note No. 9-209-107. [Available at SSRN.] Zachary Karabell, “The Uberization of Money,” Wall Street Journal, Nov 6, 2015. Randall Smith, “Challenged by Upstarts, Lenders Try New Strategy: Cooperation,” New York Times, Jan 7, 2016. Optional Campbell, John Y. “Household Finance.” Journal of Finance 61, No.
